def_en: If someone is living in a make-believe world, they are pretending that things are better, different, or more exciting than they really are instead of facing up to reality.

def_cn: （孩子们玩的）假装，假扮（游戏）
def_en: You use make-believe to refer to the activity involved when a child plays a game in which they pretend something, for example that they are someone else.

def_cn: 虚假的;虚幻的;虚构的;假装的
def_en: You use make-believe to describe things, for example in a play or film, that imitate or copy something real, but which are not what they appear to be.
